long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) Calculator

Find out how many calories do you need each day with this simple calories calculator. 

To determine daily calories needs for a men or a woman, you can choose between 2 formulas:
 - Mifflin-St Jeor formula for daily BMR
 - Harrisâ€“Benedict formular for daily calories needs

With this accurate (Basal Metabolic Rate) BMR calculator you can easily calculate your daily calories needs, at one click away.
